attributes.action: tax chewing gum so that the money can be used to remove it from our streets.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All our streets and pavements seem to be covered in disgusting remains of chewing gum. It would make sense to levy an additional tax on this product to finance its removal from the streets.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
